name: SickBrick

reviews.review_text: After 40 minutes I had all the 5 weapons and in one hour I completed the game It's pretty much like Portal without the puzzling, sounds awful but I enjoyed playing it.

All right mates!  Do you have 2 hours? Do you like old school shoot em up first person games? Do you like comedy and a little bit abstract theme? Well this game is for you :)  SickBrick is simple and very short FPS, but I really enjoy it. It is pure fun. Yeah.... graphic isn't most realistic and you can find some bugs in this game but still it got something..... soul i think.

Normally I wouldn't have bought this game, I got it in a ♥♥♥ bundle. However, I did enjoy playing it.  Pros: - Unique style and appearance  - Simple mechanics - Easy to play  Cons: - Lack of dialogue in the middle of the game (the end would've been so much better if there was a bit more of a story :\) - No real challenge, I wanted to see more chambers if they were going to do some make a few challenges but there were only a few chambers so that felt really disconnected.  - Builds off of the last one, it feels a lot like Portal, up until the end. More dialogue from Brick would've helped that.  All in all, not bad I enjoyed it.
I'll agree with the other reviews that it's not notably good or bad. But I want to add that the humor and dialogue was abysmal and I actually cringed. Yeah, I kinda didn't like this game.
I tries to be funny like Portal but fails miserably.
Short but very fun little game. Reminds me a lot of Portal, except with guns, flying, and tanks.  Very good if you want some fun for a few hours!
Enjoyed playing this one. Huge thumbs up!
Someone's first attempt at making a game. Not offensively bad.  It has skeletons in it. Don't play it if you don't like skeletons.

The lies 'SickBrick is an action-packed Sci-Fi FPS with vivid graphics and fast, frantic gameplay.   The game consists of 15 levels mixing indoor and outdoor areas. You’re forced to do tests for an unknown robotic mastermind. Destroy hundreds of hostile robots with a wide variety of weapons on a strange alien planet. Jump in a hover-tank and wreak havoc on giant boss enemies. As you go through the tests, you slowly unravel the story through log files of previous test subjects.'  The truth IMO SickBrick is a dull fps with more roblox like graphics and a cheap short story, the log files are useless TOTALLY USELESS, 'I found some stuff I better stay here and die, the end.', There is some male-voiced robot that speaks some useless stuff, and the main objective is kill, go there, kill, go there, kill, go there. Also there's mentioned a wide variety of weapons, 5 WEAPONS is A Wide variety ? Really ? No, I do not recommend this 'Game'  EDIT: Somebody doesn't like the review, probably the Dev.
Would reccomend! A+ sci-fi setting and graphics. Destroying robots all around was fun!

SickBrick is a old school fps that takes place in a testing facility similar like Portal. This means that the maps could have been design like they wanted with the only restriction that it would fit in a closed environment. But what they have done is just make empty rectangle hall after hall. The game doesn't have great art style or graphics and looks kinda dull. The enemies look and are also boring. They are all uninspired robots that are slow too kill. It's either that they have high health or the weapons are weak. The controls do their job. The feeling you get from the game is the start of a roguelike fps games(like Tower of Guns, Paranautical Activity, Fancy Skulls) without it being a roguelike. And all the normal old school fps are miles better with better map design and more fun gameplay.
Bad. Boring. You are pretty much indestructabe. Dev didn't eveen put effort into the story.
Refreshing experience. I had a nostalgic feeling playing this old school style shooter...
Good game. It's funny to play when you are bored.
